long_description: The GCI Outdoor Compact Camp Table 25 features a 1-piece compact design that allows it to fold up smaller than most other camp tables for easy transportation to the campsite. Ideal for camping, tailgating, fishing and sporting events, the Camp Table 25 accommodates up to 4 people. Aluminum frame and heat-dissipating aluminum tabletop support up to 60 lbs. Includes telescoping legs that allow this full-size table to fold compactly. GCI Outdoor Compact Camp Table 25 folds up quickly and easily to take up little space in your car.
short_description: The GCI Outdoor Compact Camp Table 25 features a 1-piece compact design that allows it to fold up smaller than most other camp tables for easy transportation to the campsite.
